author: jonathanchapmanmoore
body:
![Untitled](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8218836/93348967-e4c69a80-f804-11ea-9631-2ac830282c39.png)

I can confirm that the master branch as of today builds on Windows 8.1 with the Windows Management Framework 5.1, first run a. I just installed VS 2017 side by side with 2012. I did just move the repo into my Projects Directory. I'm moving the build into my 8.1 build lab we might want to put the build support lab files up again.

Start-PSBuild -Clean

![Untitled](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8218836/93350148-4fc4a100-f806-11ea-8a07-f5b978963eda.png)
title: 9/16/2020 Master Branch 10 AM EST
